recipe_name: Toad in the hole for a crowd
method: Preheat the oven to 220C/425F/Gas 7. Place the eggs, flour, milk, water and seasoning in a large mixer and whisk until you have a smooth batter. Place in the fridge to rest for 30 minutes. Put the lard in two large roasting tins and place in the oven for 5-8 minutes or until it is smoking. Carefully pour in the batter - it will sizzle softly in the hot fat - then arrange the sausages in the batter. Transfer the tins back to the oven and bake for 25-30 minutes until puffed and golden-brown.
